description: Updates the session policy attached to the user or group for the specified Amazon EMR Studio.

parameters.name: StudioId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio.

parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description: Specifies whether the identity to update is a user or a group.

parameters.name: SessionPolicyArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session policy to associate with the specified user or group.
